food.name: Provisions
food.description:
Various assortments of preserved food servable for daily ration. Mostly stale, yet in high demand. 
Price for 20 units.

supply.name: Supplies
supply.description: An assemblance of various commodities which can be sold or used in certain tasks. Required for outside camping

rope.name: Ropes
rope.description:
A sturdy rope required for safe transfer of unwilling slaves.

[color=yellow]Must be in possession to capture defeated people. [/color]

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A simple source of light during night or enclosed spaces.

teleportseal.name: Teleportation Seal
teleportseal.description:
Magical divice allowing a single person to teleport to specified personal location. 

[color=yellow]Allows to send captured people to your mansion without going with them.[/color]

bandage.name: Bandages
bandage.description: A portable way to patch up an injured person. Restores 33% of health (20% if used recently).

lockpick.name: Lockpicks
lockpick.description: Assemblance of various tools for certain precisive tasks.

teleportwimborn.name: Teleportation Stone: Wimborn
teleportwimborn.description:
A waypoint stone made by skilled Arcanesmith which allows personal transportation to specific faraway places when integrated into specifically designed mechanisms. 

[color=yellow]Unlocks teleportation to Wimborn.[/color]

teleportgorn.name: Teleportation Stone: Gorn
teleportgorn.description:
A waypoint stone made by skilled Arcanesmith which allows personal transportation to specific faraway places when integrated into specifically designed mechanisms. 

[color=yellow]Unlocks teleportation to Gorn.[/color]

teleportfrostford.name: Teleportation Stone: Frostford
teleportfrostford.description:
A waypoint stone made by skilled Arcanesmith which allows personal transportation to specific faraway places when integrated into specifically designed mechanisms. 

[color=yellow]Unlocks teleportation to Frostford.[/color]

teleportamberguard.name: Teleportation Stone: Amberguard
teleportamberguard.description:
A waypoint stone made by skilled Arcanesmith which allows personal transportation to specific faraway places when integrated into specifically designed mechanisms. 

[color=yellow]Unlocks teleportation to Amberguard.[/color]

teleportumbra.name: Teleportation Stone: Umbra
teleportumbra.description:
A waypoint stone made by skilled Arcanesmith which allows personal transportation to specific faraway places when integrated into specifically designed mechanisms. 

[color=yellow]Unlocks teleportation to Umbra.[/color]

aphrodisiac.name: Aphrodisiac
aphrodisiac.description: The simple dream drug of the past. Increases the drinker's lust.

hairdye.name: Hair Dye
hairdye.description: Allows you to permanently change hair color when applied. For external use only.

hairgrowthpot.name: Hair Growth Elixir
hairgrowthpot.description: Makes hair grow instantly! A tiny disclaimer says this potion is not a FairyCo. product.

maturingpot.name: Maturing Elixir
maturingpot.description: Causes a rapid acceleration in user's physical growth, results may vary.

youthingpot.name: Youthing Elixir
youthingpot.description: Causes a regression of users's physical growth. 'Cause the smaller, the cuter.

regressionpot.name: Elixir of Regression
regressionpot.description: Causes a regression of user's mental state to that of a child. Dangerous, but quite effective when you have a need to rehabilitate someone from their inconvenient character.

claritypot.name: Elixir of Clarity
claritypot.description: A strong mixture allowing the removal of persistent mental qualities.

amnesiapot.name: Amnesia Potion
amnesiapot.description: Erases memories of the past (won't affect backstory or impactful experience).

oblivionpot.name: Oblivion Potion
oblivionpot.description:
The drinker of this potion experiences a form of targeted amnesia, retaining their personality but clearing their fixations.

[color=aqua]Resets level-up requirement.[/color]

stimulantpot.name: Stimulant Potion
stimulantpot.description: Boosts person's sensitivity and strengthens mental response.

deterrentpot.name: Deterrent Potion
deterrentpot.description: Dulls person's sensitivity and weakens mental response.

minoruspot.name: Minorus Concoction
minoruspot.description: Application of this potion will reduce cumbersome body parts to more manageable sizes. For External use only.

majoruspot.name: Majorus Concoction
majoruspot.description: Apply to various parts of someone's anatomy for rapid and fantastic results! For external use only.

beautypot.name: Beauty Mixture
beautypot.description: Clears the complexion and smoothes unsightly contours. Temporal effect. Administer with care.

aphroditebrew.name: Aphrodite Brew
aphroditebrew.description:
Extremely potent mixture of aphrodisiacs. Even slightest amounts of this can easily dim person's mind and awake their carnal desires. 
[color=yellow]Can't be used for single person, required to start orgy. [/color]

basicsolutioning.name: Basic Solution
basicsolutioning.description: Primal ingredient which is used as base for many potions.

magicessenceing.name: Magic Essence
magicessenceing.description: A gleaming substance, rich with potent energy.

taintedessenceing.name: Tainted Essence
taintedessenceing.description: A dark substance, imbued with corrupting magic.

natureessenceing.name: Nature Essence
natureessenceing.description: A clear substance, rich with raw life-energy.

bestialessenceing.name: Bestial Essence
bestialessenceing.description: A pale and milky substance, rich with vigorous energy.

fluidsubstanceing.name: Fluid Substance
fluidsubstanceing.description: An oily transparent liquid with some unique abilities. Sometimes used as cheap lubricant.

gem.name: Precious Gem
gem.description: An unusually big precious gem. Traders will likely pay a huge sum for it.

clothcommon.name: Common Clothes
clothcommon.description: Bland common clothes without much of appeal. Thankfully there's no shortage of them.

clothsundress.name: Sundress
clothsundress.description: Simple, comfortable, and lighthearted. Perfect for relaxation and exposure to sudden wind gusts.

effect.descript: Reduces Stress by the end of a day

clothmaid.name: Maid Uniform
clothmaid.description: A set of black and white frilly clothes with a mandatory skirt and garter belt. Makes cleaning duty pleasant to watch.

effect.descript: Increases Obedience by the end of a day

clothkimono.name: Kimono
clothkimono.description: Brightly colored foreign clothes which are pretty popular for certain people.

clothmiko.name: Miko Outfit
clothmiko.description: Contrasting red and white clothes, originally worn by young women of certain foreign religions. They are now fetishized by certain people...

effect.descript: Reduces stress and lust by the end of a day

armorninja.name: Ninja Suit
armorninja.description: A compact and versatile outfit rumored to be used by foreign assassins.

clothpet.name: Pet Suit
clothpet.description: Specially designed pieces of leather decoration which represent a domestic animal, and force the wearer to walk on all fours. For obvious reasons, this should generally not be worn outside.

effect.descript: Greatly increases obedience. If Confidence above 40, cause stress penalty and lowers it by the end of a day.

clothchain.name: Chainmail Bikini
clothchain.description: Sexy “armor” that emphasizes the physical fitness of the wearer. Contrary to popular belief it is an impractical choice for protective wear.

clothbutler.name: Butlers Uniform
clothbutler.description: This is the uniform of a butler, a well fitted suit comprising of a double-breasted coat, waistcoat and trousers, along with a small black tie.

effect.descript: Increases Obedience by the end of a day

clothbedlah.name: Bedlah
clothbedlah.description: Loose, translucent clothing from southern regions, generally worn by dancers and members of a harem.

effect.descript: Slightly increases Charm by the end of a day.

underwearplain.name: Plain Underwear
underwearplain.description: Plain white cotton underwear for everyday life.

underwearlacy.name: Lacy Underwear
underwearlacy.description:
Fancy and cute underwear available for people with moderate income.
[color=green]Increases person's luxury[/color]

underwearboxers.name: Silk Boxers
underwearboxers.description:
Fancy and comfortable male underwear available for people with moderate income.
[color=green]Increases person's luxury[/color]

armorleather.name: Leather Armor
armorleather.description: Suit of tanned leather, providing some protection while not restricting movement too much.

armorchain.name: Chain Armor
armorchain.description: A finely crafted suit of armor created from interwoven iron rings. Offers reasonable protection against sharp objects.

armorelvenchain.name: Elven Chain Armor
armorelvenchain.description: A suit of elvish armor created from interwoven mithril rings. It is supple and light yet provides ample protection.

armorplate.name: Plate Armor
armorplate.description: An old, durable suit of plate armor. Protects the wearer against most physical damage.

armorrobe.name: Wizard's Robe
armorrobe.description: Despite what might appear as a clunky piece of clothing, combat robes allow the wearer to hold and hide various items and potions for quick and unexpected use and don't restrict movement. Outer fabric is easily torn to prevent grabbing and tuckling and can be quickly repaired with magic later.

weapondaggerrust.name: Rusty Dagger
weapondaggerrust.description: An alleged weapon. You really should find something else...

weapondagger.name: Dagger
weapondagger.description: A simple weapon providing bare minimum of physical power.

weaponsword.name: Long Sword
weaponsword.description:
Medium sized sword perfectly balanced for close combat. 
[color=yellow]Requirements: 2 Agility[/color]

weaponclaymore.name: Claymore
weaponclaymore.description:
Large, two-handed sword for extra punch. Slows the wielder a little due to its size and weight.
[color=yellow]Requirements: 4 Strength[/color]

accgoldring.name: Golden Ring
accgoldring.description:
This finely crafted gold ring comprises of two intertwined bands.
[color=green]Increases person's luxury[/color]

accslavecollar.name: A Leather Slave Collar
accslavecollar.description: This leather collar is designed to fit tightly around the neck. It has rings to which bindings can be attached.

effect.descript: Increases Obedience by the end of a day.

acchandcuffs.name: A Pair Of Handcuffs
acchandcuffs.description: These handcuffs are lightly padded but robust enough to secure even the most troublesome person.

effect.descript: Increases Obedience by the end of a day and prevents escapes.

acctravelbag.name: Travelling Bag
acctravelbag.description:
A great partner of any experienced adventurer. Despite minor wear, it looks really sturdy. 
Increases party's total carry weight by 20.

weaponelvensword.name: Elven Sword
weaponelvensword.description:
Medium sized sword perfectly balanced for close combat. 
[color=yellow]Requirements: 4 Agility[/color]

accamuletruby.name: Ruby Amulet
accamuletruby.description: A luxury piece of jewelry with a trace of magic.

accamuletemerald.name: Emerald Amulet
accamuletemerald.description: A luxury piece of jewelry with a trace of magic.

weaponnaturestaff.name: Staff of Nature
weaponnaturestaff.description:
A twisted branch infused with Nature's power. Strengthens weilder but is not a very effective weapon.
[color=yellow]Requirements: 1 Magic Affinity[/color]

armortentacle.name: Living Armor
armortentacle.description: An unearthly semi-living object which can be worn. Feeds on the fluids of wearer which periodically stimulates in private places.

clothtentacle.name: Living Suit
clothtentacle.description: Parasitic suit which feeds on bodily fluids and stimulates person's privates.

effect.descript: lust grows at the end of the day

armorrogue.name: Rogue's Armor
armorrogue.description: An unearthy semi-living object which can be weared. Feeds on the fluids of wearer which periodically stimulates in private places.

weaponcursedsword.name: Cursed Blade
weaponcursedsword.description: An ancient mystical blade. Strong magic keeps it sharp even to this day, but all power comes with a price...

weaponhammer.name: Great Hammer
weaponhammer.description:
A mighty weapon designed to deal with armored targets. 
[color=yellow]Requirements: 4 Strength[/color]

zoebook.name: Mysterious Book
zoebook.description: An ancient book written in unknown language...

aydabrandy.name: Ice Brandy
aydabrandy.description: A quite expensive alcohol beverage brewed with a secret recipe. Feels cold to the taste even if it is not.

aydabook.name: Fairies and Their Many Uses
aydabook.description: A fancy looking book with bright cover. It seems to also have a number of indecent illustrations.

aydajewel.name: Ayda's Necklace
aydajewel.description: This jewelry must be really important to someone.
